title: The Stepmother Has Left - Novel Updates
tags: Artists   Beautiful Female Lead   Broken Engagement   Childcare   Cold Protagonist   Death of Loved Ones   Divorce   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Love Triangles   Misunderstandings   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Second Chance
author: AO형
description:
I was happy to be a stepmother to my beloved friend’s family.

There was only a husband that’s constantly preoccupied and two stepsons that avoided me whenever they could

After seven years, I left them.

The moment I realized my artistic talent and tried to live a new life, two new men appeared in front of me.

And...

'You left without a word, and you were here.'

...They came to me.
>
